What is the primary function of the SARS: Facilitating viral entry into host cells through interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
Providing structural support to the viral envelope.
Inhibiting host immune responses during infection.
Replicating viral RNA within host cells.
What was the impact of the core mutation: They significantly increased affinity for SARS-CoV-2 RBD by enhancing hydrophobic interactions.
They decreased the nanobody's stability in physiological conditions.
They reduced the nanobody's specificity for the SARS-CoV-2 RBD.
They caused the nanobody to lose its ability to bind SARS-CoV-1 RBD.
What was the source of the VHH72 nanobod: Llama immunization with SARS-CoV-1 spike protein.
Mouse immunization with SARS-CoV-2 spike protein.
